I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:

- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

step_failure_init = fun (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) => ([], step_async_init) : forall (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0), list name * network Arguments step_failure_init {P0 P}
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
MultiParamsNameTotalMap : forall B0 B1 : BaseParams, MultiParams B0 -> MultiParams B1 -> Type
tot_map_trace_occ = fun e : name * (input + list output) => let (n, s) := e in match s with | inl io => (tot_map_name n, inl (tot_map_input io)) | inr lo => (tot_map_name n, inr (map tot_map_output lo)) end : name * (input + list output) -> name * (input + list output)
Record FailureParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_FailureParams { reboot : data -> data } Arguments FailureParams {P0} Arguments Build_FailureParams [P0] _ _%function_scope
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
tot_map_net = fun net : network => {| nwPackets := map tot_map_packet (nwPackets net); nwState := fun n : name => tot_map_data (nwState net (tot_map_name_inv n)) |} : network -> network
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
Record MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1) (M : MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1) : Prop := Build_MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective { tot_map_name_inv_inverse : forall n : name, tot_map_name_inv (tot_map_name n) = n; tot_map_name_inverse_inv : forall n : name, tot_map_name (tot_map_name_inv n) = n } Arguments MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective {B0 B1 P0 P1} Arguments Build_MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective [B0 B1 P0 P1] _ (_ _)%function_scope
FailureParamsTotalMapCongruency : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), FailureParams P0 -> FailureParams P1 -> BaseParamsTotalMap B0 B1 -> Prop
MultiParamsTotalMapCongruency : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), BaseParamsTotalMap B0 B1 -> MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1 -> MultiParamsMsgTotalMap P0 P1 -> Prop
Record BaseParamsTotalMap (P0 P1 : BaseParams) : Type := Build_BaseParamsTotalMap { tot_map_data : data -> data; tot_map_input : input -> input; tot_map_output : output -> output } Arguments Build_BaseParamsTotalMap _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
MultiParamsMsgTotalMap : forall B0 B1 : BaseParams, MultiParams B0 -> MultiParams B1 -> Type
step_failure_star = fun (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) (params : FailureParams P) => refl_trans_1n_trace step_failure : forall (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0), FailureParams P -> step_relation (list name * network) (name * (input + list output)) Arguments step_failure_star {P0 P params}
input = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, input, _) := BaseParams0 in input : BaseParams -> Type Arguments input {BaseParams}
tot_map_name = fun (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1) (MultiParamsNameTotalMap0 : MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1) => let (tot_map_name, _) := MultiParamsNameTotalMap0 in tot_map_name : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1 -> name -> name Arguments tot_map_name {B0 B1 P0 P1 MultiParamsNameTotalMap}
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) } Arguments Build_MultiParams _ [name msg]%type_scope (_ _)%function
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
tot_map_output = fun (P0 P1 : BaseParams) (BaseParamsTotalMap0 : BaseParamsTotalMap P0 P1) => let (_, _, tot_map_output) := BaseParamsTotalMap0 in tot_map_output : forall P0 P1 : BaseParams, BaseParamsTotalMap P0 P1 -> output -> output Arguments tot_map_output {P0 P1 BaseParamsTotalMap}
